I do hate all the tourists in London. You'd never catch me saying I love these people who are taking pictures everywhere. Like go back home, no one wants you here ruining the London vibes.

"Fuck you & fuck your family" this was the moment a group of men just attempted to intimidate & threaten me, I was sat at a table with 5 children. Hardly makes you a gangsta when theirs a group of 7 men, my children were shaken up by it as the lad said he was going to put holes in me, he also recorded all my children's images.
